metadata.title: CVE-2020-8696 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Improper removal of sensitive information before storage or transfer insome Intel(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentiallyenable information disclosure via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8696` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20201110.0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20201110.0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
